  • Uses of ToDoList in control

    Methods in control that return ToDoList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ToDoList ToDoControl.getList​(java.lang.String name)
    Get the ToDoList from the model which have the name.
    ToDoList ToDoControl.removeList​(java.lang.String id)
    Remove a list with the same name as the id.
    Methods in control that return types with arguments of type ToDoList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<ToDoList> ToDoControl.getAll()
    Return the List of ToDoList stored in the model.
    Methods in control with parameters of type ToDoList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void ToDoControl.creationSort​(java.lang.String nameList, ToDoList toDoList)
    Sort all task in a list which have the name of nameList in the order of the creation date.
    private void ToDoControl.dateSort​(java.lang.String nameList, ToDoList toDoList)
    Sort all task in a list which have the name of nameList in the order of the dueDate.
    private void ToDoControl.doneSort​(java.lang.String nameList, ToDoList toDoList)
    Sort all task in a list which have the name of nameList in the order of the done of each task.
    private void ToDoControl.importantSort​(java.lang.String nameList, ToDoList toDoList)
    Sort all task in a list which have the name of nameList in the order of the important of each task.
    private void ToDoControl.nameSort​(java.lang.String nameList, ToDoList toDoList)
    Sort all task in a list which have the name of nameList in the order of the name of each task.
